referenceObject.reference: Valdez-Mondragón, A. & Francke, O. F. (2015). Phylogeny of the spider genus Ixchela Huber, 2000 (Araneae: Pholcidae) based on morphological and molecular evidence (CO1 and 16S), with a hypothesized diversification in the Pleistocene. Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society 175(1): 20-58.
